heroPage.title: Recepto
heroPage.description: Recepto is a collaborative collection of recipes and ingredients for everyday use and accessible to everyone.

recipe.title: Recipe Library
recipe.description: Store your favorite recipes and explore variations for each dish. Never forget a recipe again.

filter.title: Smart Filters
filter.description: Find the perfect recipe using a multitude of filters to refine your searches according to your needs.

planner.title: Weekly Planning
planner.description: Organize your meals for the whole week and manage your shopping list directly from a weekly calendar.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Access all your created recipes, view your statistics, and share them with your friends.

privacy.title: Security and privacy
privacy.description: Cook with peace of mind, none of your data is stored or shared with third parties.

collaborative.title: Collaborative
collaborative.description: Our site grows with your recipes. Participate and be part of the community.

errorPage.title: Page not found
errorPage.description: We are sorry but this page could not be found.
